scenes.action_text: DEEP COVER Written by Michael Tolkin and Henry Bean Story by Michael Tolkin SHOOTING DRAFT EXT. CLEVELAND STREET - NIGHT (1970) Rain. Christmas lights. A rusted out '56 Lincoln rattles down the bleak boulevard. In it: JOE STEVENS, an angry, black man in his late 20's, beside him his 10-year-old son, JOE JR. Joe Jr. stares out the window at passing:
